name: Snow Angel (galengames)
description:
❄️ ABOUT

"What if when you wished for something, someone answered?"

Snow Angel is a heart-warming love story between a human and an angel involving fluff, baking and falling snow. Pick your own pronouns and experience a charming tale within the alps.

❄️ DETAILS

  • Format : Visual Novel
  • Genre : Romance, Otome
  • Length : 20k words
  • Language : English
  • Platform : PC (Windows, Mac, Linux)
  • 3 endings
  • 4 unlockable CGs

❄️ TEAM

Created for Nanoreno2021. The project was possible thanks to the following amazing people:

Art - Crysil

Writing - LunaMakaio , Crystal

Music - Ednar Pinho

Copy Editing - Cygni

Scripting - Crysil, LunaMakaio
